attributes.action: ALEVELS 2021 - CANCEL EXAMS and use an alternative grading System!!!!!
attributes.additional_details:
Don’t let our future doctors, lawyers and teachers not Persue their goals by forcing them to sit exams they are doomed to Not successfully succeed in because of lack of support and Due to self teaching! 
DO THIS FOR THE STUDENTS!!! AND THE COUNTRIES LONG TERM FUTURE!!! 

It will be these students who will be repaying the debts from COVID19
attributes.background: How can A level students be expected to take exams in 2021, having missed at least 5 vital months of education? Students from 2020 had their full two years of education and did not take their exams so how can we be expected to take ours?!
